Clip in Hair Extensions - Platinum Blonde - Straight - 18in / 46cm - Full Head - 8 Pcs 120g - Japanese Heat Resistant Synthetic Hairpiece - Looks and Feels like Real Hair Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '18 x 38.98 x 0.39 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SCIHLST20920', 'UPC': '799632432838'} fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! fantastic value for fake hair Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! This is elegant HAIR! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user maintains a strong interest in hair extensions, particularly synthetic options that closely mimic real hair. They have shown a preference for both straight and curly styles, likely seeking versatility in their looks.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: The user favors platinum blonde shades with highlights but has recently expanded their interest to include browns, especially golden tones. This indicates a growing exploration of color while still prioritizing aesthetic alignment with their overall style.

- **Product Characteristics**: They prioritize high-quality, easy-to-apply extensions that blend seamlessly with natural hair. Recent purchases suggest an interest in lighter, comfortable options that maintain appearance and fullness over time.

- **Value for Money**: The user appreciates products that offer excellent value. A recent experience with a less satisfactory purchase underscores their expectation for high-quality items at reasonable prices.

- **Care Instructions**: The user remains focused on practical care guidelines, favoring instructions that promote the longevity and effective maintenance of their products.

Overall, this user exhibits a consistent preference for functional, aesthetically pleasing hair extensions and styling tools that are comfortable to wear and easy to maintain. Their recent interest in different color shades reflects a willingness to explore new styles while adhering to their quality and realism standards. The mixed review of a recent product highlights their discerning taste and focus on value.
